00030 string cMenuMode::mainloop() {
00031         string tmpmode;
00032         
00033         InitMode(RESET_MODE | MENU_MODE );
00034         currentitem = menuitems.begin();
00035         (*currentitem)->active = true;
00036         for (unsigned i=1; i<menuitems.size(); i++) {
00037                 menuitems[i]->active = false;
00038         }
00039         
00040         while (1) {
00041                 
00042                 if ((tmpmode = handleevents()) != "continue") { 
00043                         return tmpmode; 
00044                 }
00045                 draw();
00046                 
00047                 //frames++; if (SDL_GetTicks()-dtime >= 1000) {cout << frames << " fps." << endl; frames = 0; dtime = SDL_GetTicks();} // calc fps.
00048                 
00049         }
00050         return "quit";
00051 }
00052 
00053 void cMenuMode::moveup() {
00054         if (currentitem != menuitems.begin()) {
00055                 (*currentitem)->active = false;
00056                 currentitem--;
00057                 if ((*currentitem)->name == "") moveup(); // skip blank entries. Note that this will fail if the beginning or end of a menu is blank.
00058                 (*currentitem)->active = true;
00059         }
00060 }
00061 
00062 void cMenuMode::movedown() {
00063         if (currentitem+1 != menuitems.end()) { // remember, .end() points just *beyond* the end of the vector.
00064                 (*currentitem)->active = false;
00065                 currentitem++;
00066                 if ((*currentitem)->name == "") movedown(); // skip blank entries. Note that this will fail if the beginning or end of a menu is blank.
00067                 (*currentitem)->active = true;
00068         }
00069 }
00070 
00071 string cMenuMode::select() {
00072         
00073         (*currentitem)->clicked = true;
00074         draw();
00075         SDL_Delay(100);
00076         (*currentitem)->clicked = false;
00077         if ((*currentitem)->target != "") {
00078                 // load up the target mode, run it
00079                 return (*currentitem)->target;
00080         } else {
00081                 return "continue";
00082         }
00083 }
00084 
00085 string cMenuMode::handleevents() {
00086 
00087         while (SDL_PollEvent (&event)) {
00088         switch (event.type) {
00089           case SDL_KEYDOWN:
00090             switch(event.key.keysym.sym) {
00091                 case SDLK_ESCAPE:
00092                         return parent;
00093                     break;
00094                 case SDLK_UP:
00095                         moveup();
00096                         break;
00097                 case SDLK_DOWN:
00098                         movedown();
00099                         break;
00100                 case SDLK_SPACE:
00101                         return select();
00102                         break;
00103                 default:
00104                         break;
00105             }
00106               case SDL_MOUSEMOTION:
00107                         mousex = event.motion.x; mousey = event.motion.y;
00108                     break; 
00109           case SDL_QUIT:
00110                 return "quit";
00111                     break;
00112           default:
00113                     break;
00114         }
00115         }
00116         return "continue";
00117 }
00118 
00119 void cMenuMode::draw() {
00120         
00121         glLoadIdentity();
00122         gluLookAt(0,0,20, 0,0,0, 0,1,0);
00123         
00124         //draw_cursor(mousex, mousey);
00125         
00126         glRotatef(30, 0, 1, 0); 
00127         
00128         glTranslatef(-7, 5, 0);
00129 
00130         for (it=menuitems.begin(); it!=menuitems.end(); it++) {
00131                 glPushMatrix();
00132                 (*it)->draw();
00133                 glPopMatrix();
00134                 glTranslatef(0, -2, 0);
00135                 
00136         }
00137         SDL_GL_SwapBuffers();
00138         glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT);
00139 }

00141 void cMenuMode::draw_cursor(unsigned x, unsigned y) {
00142         glPushMatrix();
00143         GLdouble mvmatrix[16] = {0};
00144         GLdouble pjmatrix[16] = {0};
00145         GLint    viewport[4] = {0};
00146         
00147         glGetDoublev(GL_MODELVIEW_MATRIX, mvmatrix);
00148         glGetDoublev(GL_PROJECTION_MATRIX,pjmatrix);
00149         glGetIntegerv(GL_VIEWPORT, viewport);
00150         
00151         GLdouble result[3];
00152         
00153         gluUnProject(x, y, 0.01, 
00154                      mvmatrix, pjmatrix, viewport,
00155                      &result[0], &result[1], &result[2]);
00156                      
00157         //if (result[2] < 10)
00158         
00159         glTranslatef (result[0], -result[1], result[2]); // -y: SDL vs OpenGL
00160         
00161         //cout << result[0] << " " << -result[1] << " " << result[2] << endl;
00162         
00163         glScalef (0.2,0.2,0.2);
00164         glScalef (0.2,0.2,0.2);
00165         
00166         glBegin(GL_LINES);
00167         
00168                 glVertex3f(0, 0, -10);
00169                 glVertex3f(0, 0, 10);
00170                 
00171         glEnd();
00172         glPopMatrix();
00173         
00174 }
